niagara.connection_server
Class RequestParser

java.lang.Object
  org.xml.sax.HandlerBase
      niagara.connection_server.RequestParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, org.xml.sax.DocumentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
public class RequestParser
extends org.xml.sax.HandlerBase
implements java.lang.Runnable

This class is responsible for creating a SAX Parser for parsing incoming request messages as well as implementing DocumentHandler interface
